name: Stock Entry After Save
Harvest Stock Entry
script:
stock_entry = frappe.new_doc("Stock Entry")

stock_entry.stock_entry_type = "Harvesting"
stock_entry.custom_farm = doc.farm
stock_entry.custom_greenhouse = doc.block or doc.blck or doc.bck
stock_entry.custom_block__bed_number = doc.bay
stock_entry.custom_harvester = doc.harvester
stock_entry.custom_bucket_id = doc.bucket_id
stock_entry.to_warehouse = doc.block or doc.blck or doc.bck

stock_entry.append("items", {
    
    "item_code": doc.item_code,
    "qty": doc.quantity
})

stock_entry.insert()
stock_entry.submit()

frappe.msgprint(f"Stock Entry {stock_entry.name} created successfully.")

name: Automate Rejects Material Issue
script:
if (doc.stock_entry_type == "Field Rejects"):
    farm = doc.custom_farm
    items = []
    for item in doc.items:
        item_dict = {
            "item_code": item.item_code,
            "qty": item.qty,
            "s_warehouse": None,
            "t_warehouse": item.t_warehouse,
            "custom_rejection_reason": item.custom_rejection_reason,
            "custom_bay": item.custom_bay
        }
        
        items.append(item_dict)
        
    
    if items:
        material_issue = frappe.get_doc({
            "doctype": "Stock Entry",
            "stock_entry_type": "Field Rejects Material Issue",
            "custom_farm": farm,
            "items": []
        })

        for item in items:
            material_issue.append("items", {
                "item_code": item["item_code"],
                "qty": item["qty"],
                "s_warehouse": item["t_warehouse"],
                "t_warehouse": None,
                "custom_rejection_reason": item["custom_rejection_reason"],
                "custom_bay": item["custom_bay"]
            })

        material_issue.insert()
        
        material_issue.set_posting_time = 1 
        material_issue.posting_date = doc.posting_date
        material_issue.posting_time = doc.posting_time
        
        material_issue.submit()
        
        # Save the name of the document of material issue in the Stock Entry Doc
        
        frappe.msgprint(f"Field Rejects Material Issue {material_issue.name} created successfully.")

name: Create Box Labels
script:
if doc.workflow_state == "Pending Order Review" and doc.get_doc_before_save().workflow_state == "Draft":

    pack_list_items = doc.pack_list_item
    sales_order_id = doc.custom_sales_order
    
    # Get the farm from the item table of the fpl
    farm_warehouse = pack_list_items[0].source_warehouse
    farm = farm_warehouse.split()[0]
    
    opl = frappe.db.sql("""
        SELECT p.name 
        FROM `tabOrder Pick List` p
        JOIN `tabPick List Item` i ON i.parent = p.name
        WHERE p.sales_order = %s
        AND i.warehouse = %s
        AND i.idx = 1
        LIMIT 1
    """, (sales_order_id, f'{farm} Available for Sale - TL'), as_dict=1)
        
    
    sales_order_doc = frappe.get_doc(
            "Sales Order", sales_order_id
        )
        
        
    if opl:
        opl_doc = frappe.get_doc("Order Pick List", opl[0].name)
        
        
        
        for item in pack_list_items:
            # Check if a box label doc matching the opl used exists,
            existing_labels = frappe.get_list(
                    "Box Label",
                    filters = {
                        "order_pick_list": opl_doc.name
                    }
                )
                
    
            
            if not existing_labels:
                total_stems = 0
                box_1_items = []    
                
                for row in pack_list_items:
                    if row.box_id == "1":
                        box_1_items.append({
                            "item_code": row.item_code,
                            "bunch_uom": row.bunch_uom,
                            "bunch_qty": row.bunch_qty
                        })
                        total_stems = total_stems + row.custom_number_of_stems
                
                
                new_label = frappe.new_doc("Box Label")
                
                new_label.customer = doc.custom_customer
                new_label.box_number = 1
                new_label.order_pick_list = opl_doc.name
                new_label.pack_rate = total_stems
                new_label.date = opl_doc.date_created
                new_label.customer_purchase_order = sales_order_doc.po_no
                new_label.consignee = sales_order_doc.custom_consignee
                new_label.truck_details =  sales_order_doc.custom_truck_details
                new_label.farm_pack_list_link = doc.name
                new_label.length = pack_list_items[0].stem_length
                
                for fpl_item in box_1_items:
                    new_label.append("box_item", {
                        "variety": fpl_item["item_code"],
                        "uom": fpl_item["bunch_uom"],
                        "qty": fpl_item["bunch_qty"]
                    })
                
                
                new_label.insert()
                
            
            if existing_labels:
                # Check the number of box labels existing
                # Create the next box label (box number = number of existing box labels + 1 )
                # Filter that box number items in the fpl just like the box_1_items
                # Next add the details just like box_1 was added.
                # If there is no next box label, stop
                existing_box_count = len(existing_labels)
                box_number = existing_box_count + 1
                
                total_stems = 0
                box_items = []
                
                for row in pack_list_items:
                    if row.box_id == f"{box_number}":
                        box_items.append({
                            "item_code": row.item_code,
                            "bunch_uom": row.bunch_uom,
                            "bunch_qty": row.bunch_qty
                        })
                        total_stems = total_stems + row.custom_number_of_stems
                
            
                if len(box_items) > 0:
    
                    new_label = frappe.new_doc("Box Label")
            
                    new_label.customer = doc.custom_customer
                    new_label.box_number = box_number
                    new_label.order_pick_list = opl_doc.name
                    new_label.pack_rate = total_stems
                    new_label.date = opl_doc.date_created
                    new_label.customer_purchase_order = sales_order_doc.po_no
                    new_label.consignee = sales_order_doc.custom_consignee
                    new_label.truck_details = sales_order_doc.custom_truck_details
                    new_label.farm_pack_list_link = doc.name
                    new_label.length = pack_list_items[0].stem_length
                
                    for fpl_item in box_items:
                        new_label.append("box_item", {
                            "variety": fpl_item["item_code"],
                            "uom": fpl_item["bunch_uom"],
                            "qty": fpl_item["bunch_qty"]
                        })
                        
                    # Save the new box label
                    new_label.insert()

name: Update Grading Forecast Tracker
Update Sales Order ID on Save
Update Forecast Tracker (During Grading)
Update Tracker (During Grading Cancel)
script:
if doc.stock_entry_type == "Grading" and doc.custom_fc_repayment_doc:
    farm = doc.custom_farm
    varieties_to_update = []
    
    try:
        repayment_entry = frappe.get_doc("Stock Entry", doc.custom_fc_repayment_doc)
        tracker_doc = frappe.get_doc("Grading Forecast Tracker", farm)
        
        for item in repayment_entry.items:
            if item.s_warehouse:
                varieties_to_update.append({
                    "item_code": item.item_code,
                    "qty": item.qty
                })
                
        for update_item in varieties_to_update:
            for tracker_item in tracker_doc.items:
                if tracker_item.variety == update_item["item_code"]:
                    tracker_item.qty_deficit_in_forecast = tracker_item.qty_deficit_in_forecast + update_item["qty"]
                    break
        
        
        tracker_doc.save()
        
        doc.custom_fc_repayment_doc = None

        if repayment_entry.docstatus == 1:
            repayment_entry.cancel()

        frappe.msgprint(f"Linked Forecast Repayment entry {repayment_entry.name} was cancelled.")

    except Exception as e:
        frappe.throw(f"Error Updating Forecast Repayment: {e}")

name: Forecast Entry
script:
grading_forecast_doc = frappe.new_doc("Stock Entry")
grading_forecast_doc.stock_entry_type = "Grading Forecast"
grading_forecast_doc.custom_farm = doc.farm
grading_forecast_doc.custom_forecast_entry = doc.name

forecast_varieties = []
total_qty = 0

abbr_mapping = {
    "Burguret": "BUR",
    "Pendekeza": "PNDK",
    "Turaco": "TUR"
}

for item in doc.items:
    total_qty = total_qty + item.qty_in_stems
    
    forecast_varieties.append({
        "variety": item.item_code,
        "qty": item.qty_in_stems,
    })
    
    grading_forecast_doc.append("items", {
        "item_code": item.item_code,
        "qty": item.qty_in_stems,
        "t_warehouse": f"{abbr_mapping.get(doc.farm)} Grading Forecast - TL", 
        "uom": "Stems",
    })
    
grading_forecast_doc.append("items", {
    "item_code": f"{abbr_mapping.get(doc.farm)} Forecast Item",
    "qty": total_qty,
    "s_warehouse": f"{abbr_mapping.get(doc.farm)} Grading Forecast - TL", 
    "uom": "Stems",
})

grading_forecast_doc.insert()
grading_forecast_doc.submit()

name: Update Tracker (Grading Forecast)
Allow Packing Of Returned Bunches
Lock Dates On Submit of Sales Invoice
